name: Simorgh, Bird of Endings
desc: When this card is Normal Summoned: You can send 1 "Simorgh" card from your Deck to the GY, except "Simorgh, Bird of Endings". If your opponent controls no cards in their Spell & Trap Zones, while this card is in your GY: You can Special Summon this card in Defense Position, but banish it when it leaves the field, also you cannot Special Summon monsters for the rest of this turn, except Winged Beast monsters. You can only use each effect of "Simorgh, Bird of Endings" once per turn.
str1: Send from deck to the GY
